price: ’Alif lām mīm. (Allāhu ló mọ ohun tí Ó gbàlérò pẹ̀lú àwọn háràfí náà.)¹
footnotes:
1. Nítorí kí a lè mọ ìdí pàtàkì tí Allāhu ṣe fi sūrah yìí sọrí mọ̀lẹ́bí ‘Imrọ̄n, òbí Mọryam, ìyá Ànábì ‘Isā - kí ọlà Allāhu máa bá a -, ẹ wo ìtọsẹ̀-ọ̀rọ̀ sūrah Mọryam. 
 Ẹ wo ìtọsẹ̀-ọ̀rọ̀ sūrah al Baƙọrah; 2:1.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
